item.title: DIY Free Static Blog Publishing Platform
item.description: This site is generated by a static site generator (SSG) called hugo , but this guide will work with any SSG. Motivation I wanted to be able to keep raw markdown, and any other files that may be considered private, separate from what is viewable by the public. Parts A private Github repository to contain your raw markdown and any other assets that may or may not be considered publishable.
